ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fishies swim in me. What am I?
I live in the ocean, and I have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have lots of arms to grab things.

ocean.question: I am small and colorful and swim in the sea. What am I?
I make my home in the sea, and I have a hard shell. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ I can hide my head inside.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are scared of me.

ocean.question: I am an animal that lives in the sea, and I can do flips and tricks. What am I?
I am a very big animal that lives in the sea and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the biggest animal on Earth!

ocean.question: I am an animal that looks like a star and lives on the bottom of the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I am shaped like a star.

ocean.question: I am a small animal that lives in the sea and looks like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I have a head similar to a horse.
🌱 I like to eat small organisms.
🌊 I am very small and gentle.

ocean.question: I have a shell and walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 I walk in a funny way.
🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help the flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.

weather.question: I am big and bright and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out!

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am in the sky, but not the sun.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees. You can't see me, but you can feel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can blow your hat off.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I come after the rain and have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
🌦️ You can see me when the sun and rain are together.

weather.question: Sometimes I flash in the sky and make a loud noise. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 You might be scared of me.

weather.question: I am the loud sound that follows a flash in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can hear me from far away

weather.question: I am very small, frozen rain. I can hurt if I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 It's good to go inside when I fall!
🌧️ I fall from the sky with the rain.

weather.question: I am white and cover the ground when it is very cold. I'm not snow, but very close. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 It is cold to see me.
🌿 I make the grass look furry.
